bills.title: Resolution to provide for frontotemporal degeneration awareness week
Interim study on youth court laws
Revise change of attorney laws for public defenders
Provide for evaluations of defendants in detention centers or state prisons
Prohibit placement of sentenced defendants in the state forensic mental health facility
Regulate restraints on women while giving childbirth
Revise worker's compensation law to cover PTSD for first responders and others
Revise expungement laws to allow for certain nonviolent felony records
